name: Neon Galaxy 2048
description: Neon Galaxy 2048 is an exciting and visually stunning game that combines the classic gameplay of tile merging with a neon 3D space theme. In this game, you are tasked with strategically merging tiles to create the ultimate 2048 tile while exploring the depths of space. The neon 3D effects and immersive space environment make for a captivating gaming experience that will keep you coming back for more. As you progress through the levels, the challenges become more difficult and the neon effects more vibrant. The scoring system is based on the number of tiles you merge and the strategy you use to achieve your goals. With simple and intuitive controls, players of all skill levels can enjoy the addictive gameplay. So blast off into the depths of space and explore the neon galaxy in this exciting tile merging adventure - Neon Galaxy 2048.
